description: Final state after complex pivot - parent and sub-issues modified, new sub-issue created

issue.title: Database migration system
issue.body:
Implement database migration infrastructure.

## Requirements

- Database migration (split into schema and data phases)
- Add caching layer
- Maintain backward compatibility

subIssues.title: [Phase 1]: Schema migrations
subIssues.body:
## Description

Implement schema migration system.

## Todos

- [ ] Add migration versioning
- [ ] Add schema migration rollback support

subIssues.title: [Phase 2]: Data migrations
subIssues.body:
## Description

Implement data migration system.

## Todos

- [ ] Create data migration framework
- [ ] Add rollback support
- [ ] Split data migration into batches

subIssues.title: [Phase 3]: Implement caching layer
subIssues.body:
## Description

Add caching support to improve performance after migration.

## Affected Areas

- `src/cache/` (create) - Cache implementation
- `src/api/` (modify) - Add cache integration

## Todos

- [ ] Set up Redis connection
- [ ] Implement cache invalidation
- [ ] Add cache to hot paths
